item.description:
1-1:30 introductions, socializing, show and tell
1:30-3pm Lets make stuff! bring your own CD's and supplies, or use the ones I will have available. Check out the CD message thread on the message boards for ideas and inspiration.
3-3:30 clean up, wrap up, talk about next meeting.
item.how_to_find_us: Go in the front door, use stairs immediately to RIGHTto go up one flight. We are
item.why: Recycling is good for the environment, and also a cheap source of art supplies

group.name: The Altered Art and Assemblage Meetup Group

item.name: Altering CD's into art
